Articles.Content:
So I have been on this forum for over 2 years yet I have post o so little, so here is my first post ever.

Because I couldn't think of anything else I'll just do a self made F.A.Q

F.A.Q:

Q. Where do you live

A. Vancouver British Colombia, Canada.

Q. Favorite type of game.

A. RTS or stimulation

Q. PC specs (cause why not)

A. AMD 8320 (OC) GTX 660 (OC) 8GB RAM (OC).

Q. Stuff you do other than video games

A. Politics and Royal Canadian Air Cadets.

Q. What do you think about KSP and how far it's come?

A. It has come so far from just try to make it to the mun (that being the only place to go at the time) and having to pray the space kracken didn't decide your ship looked like a tasty lunch.

Yeah thats all I could think of. So there it is the first post from someone who has lurked for 2 years.

Edited October 26, 2014 by Vanamonde
I think this might set a record for lurking on the forum. Congratulations on coming out of the shadows.
Your name made me crack up a bit more than it should have . Welcome!

Holy kraken. That's definitely a record for lurking. I lurked while not a member for about a year and then once I finally bought the game I had been playing for about 4 months before I joined the forums. It's no question that I'm a better player now than I was before I joined the forums, so I'm glad you finally came out of the shadows!

Q. Where do you live

A. Vancouver British Colombia, Canada.

This may be the first time I've said it this way, but I guess you wanted to spell "Columbia".

And welcome to the forum!

Hey, look! Somebody else created an account to just look at others posts and then suddenly decided to introduce himself!

Heya, and welcome to KSP!
